Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Office of the Mayor](https://www.trentonnj.org/478/Office-of-the-Mayor)
2. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.ecode360.com/documents/pub/TR0722/Agendas/?)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
3. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.trentonnj.org/252/Boards-Commissions)

   Browse a listing of boards and commissions operating in Trenton.
4. #### [City Audits](https://nj-trenton.civicplus.com/467/Audits)
5. #### [City Budgets](https://nj-trenton.civicplus.com/468/Budgets)
6. #### [City Clerk](https://www.trentonnj.org/311/City-Clerk)

   The Municipal Clerk holds one of the most important and exacting positions in municipal government, as outlined in NJSA 40A:9-133.
7. #### [City Codes](https://www.ecode360.com/TR0722?needHash=true)

   View the City of Trenton code of ordinances.
8. #### [City Council](https://www.trentonnj.org/259/City-Council)

   The Trenton City Council is the legislative branch of the Trenton City government.
9. #### [Election Results](http://www.mercercounty.org/government/county-clerk-/elections/archived-election-results)

   View the City of Trenton election results.
10. #### [News & Announcements](https://www.trentonnj.org/CivicAlerts.aspx)

    Stay up-to-date on current organizational news and announcements.
11. #### [Ordinances](https://www.ecode360.com/documents/pub/TR0722/Legislation/?)

    Get access to the approved ordinances for the City of Trenton.
12. #### [Resolutions](https://www.ecode360.com/documents/pub/TR0722/Resolutions/?)

    Take a look at the City of Trenton resolutions.
13. #### [Tax Rates](https://www.trentonnj.org/185/City-Tax-Rate)

    View current and historical tax rates for the City.
14. #### [Ward Map (PDF)](https://www.trentonnj.org/DocumentCenter/View/440/Official-Ward-and-Election-District-Map-PDF)

    Check out the City of Trenton Ward Map.
